extendedInfo.description: The Baby Preparation Kit is an app that will help you track and record all important information needed throughout your pregnancy.The Contraction Timer helps you time, record your contractions and helps you recognize stages of labor.The Checklist allows you to create custom TO DO lists of things you want to get done before the big date.The Movement Recorder lets you record all movements of your little one while inside you. This helps you figure out routines and trends in movements and moods before the baby is born.The Water Break option allows you to record TACO in the case your water breaks so you can accurately inform your healthcare professional.There is also an Instruction Manual included that will teach you how to use the app, as well as an FAQ that will include questions asked by other users. (to ask questions, please email babykit@rojosolutions.com)Let us know what you think of the app and what new features you would like to see. Also, look for our other apps in the market soon. Hope you enjoy the app!The two Internet and Network state permissions are used to serve Banner Ads only.Disclaimer: Baby Prep Kit is not intended to replace any advice given by a health care professional nor is it intended to be used as a diagnostics tool. Please always ask and follow the advice of your chosen health care professionals.

reviews.title: HTC
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice app, it would be better if you could reset information as was trialling but couldn\'t find an option to delete or rest contraction information. Even when you change user details previous entries are stored.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Never even let me open it...forced close every time I tried.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a good app, it functions. I want to be able to change the background. It\'s a little awkward to use in some circles and I don\'t like it anyway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great for keeping track of kicks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Serves It\'s Purpose
reviews.comment: I don\'t care much for the app, I have others that do the same things and more.

reviews.comment: Nice and simple app. Very useful

reviews.title: Perfect for my wife!!
reviews.comment: Wow I couldnt believe there was an app for contractions and recording time/date. Must have app if your expecting a baby!

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Wife loves it It helps her remember all information asked by the doc
